spells.name: Dragon's Breath
spells.description: Gives you a dragon's breath weapon.

spells.name: Elemental Body I
spells.description: Turns you into a Small elemental.

spells.name: Summon Monster IV
spells.description: Summons elemental creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Ball Lightning
spells.description: Flying balls of lightning deal 3d6 electricity damage each.

spells.name: River of Wind
spells.description: A stream of wind causes nonlethal damage and can knock down or push creatures.

spells.name: Shout
spells.description: Deafens all within cone, 5d6 sonic damage.

spells.name: Acid Pit
spells.description: Creates a pit with acid at the bottom.

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.description: Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you're protected from heat or cold.

spells.name: Firefall
spells.description: Fire bursts upward, dealing 2d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.description: 2d4 fire damage to 10 ft. and 1d4 to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.description: Hail deals 5d6 damage in area 40 ft. across.

spells.name: Wall of Ice
spells.description: Ice plane creates wall or hemisphere creates dome.
